My Intro

About Me

I am interested in using explainable artificial intelligence (AI) to create more interpretable networks that can be interpreted using logic-based methods. During my studies, I have worked on graph neural networks and convolutional neural networks. I am interested in using various logic-based methods for generalized AI. I am also interested in various image-based analyses, CI/CD, knowledge graphs and ontology engineering. Since I have an engineering bachelor's, I occasionally work on system administration and Raspberry PI.

Contact Me
